description:
This is a gorgeous and clean large studio apartment in the heart of NYC. It is in Times Square/Hells Kitchen area. Close to all methods of transportation with easy access to transport to all three airports. It is also close to Javitz, Shake Shack, Rockefeller Center, and its right next to a citi bike location. You’ll love my place because of the ambiance, the neighborhood, bars and restaurants, and the modern apt.

It's a modern apartment in a luxury building. This is in the heart of Manhattan. Two blocks to Times Square.

You do not have access to the amenities such as pool, gym, etc.

Please let us know what time you will arrive so we can arrange to meet you and walk you to the property.

There are two parking garages within a block. All trains are within walking distance.

If you require assistance at anytime during your stay, please don't hesitate to contact us. We can be reached by (EMAIL HIDDEN) by phone at: ((PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN), or by Airbnb message.
name: Private Luxury Studio Apt in heart of NYC
review:
Very nice apartment with an outstanding view .
Great value for the money, an hotel will have costed 50% more.
